title: Real Estate Website
description: This Real Estate project epitomizes modernity and responsiveness. By utilizing the Swiper library, I have transformed it into a visually appealing platform for users.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: Powerful and robust e-commerce website that boasts advanced search and filtering capabilities, allowing users to effortlessly find what they are looking for.

title: Travel Website
description: I learned to play around with Tailwind CSS in this React project. The resulting website features an array of stunning images with an intuitive and user-friendly design.
